I just noticed we now have over 20000 posts on eGroups! Congrats all!

And congratulations to Megan for getting post #20000! I love you, 
Megan! *kisses Megan*

If anyone hasn't figured it out, me and Megan are a couple. 

GTG. I'll post in the morning.

::Zardus::

Zardus smiles, recieving Astral's transmission.

"I'll send you the coordinates. There is already a ship there, soon 
the Alliance base and the rest of the Alliance will arrive as well."

He ends the transmission, his comm sending the coordinates.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> (OOC: Once again, what I posted for Decadel and Hell Drak in my big 
post was COMPLETELY MISSED and/or IGNORED............And, Hakibuscon 
slashed at Burning Hammer from behind with an energon knife)
> 
> ::Dark Lavacons::
> 
>           Astral and the others picked up Zardus' message.
> 
>          "Yes........New headquarters to plan out destruction!" 
Recklessa cackled.
> 
>         Astral opened his com to Zardus.
> 
>        "Zardus, we need coordinates for the Alliance's new 
location," He said.
